document.full_text: two people were killed and four others wounded early on monday when a gunman opened fire at an oakland nightclub, then sped away in a car with three suspected accomplices, police said.
document.title: two killed, four wounded in oakland nightclub shooting
lines_and_colors: two people were killed and four others wounded early on monday when a gunman opened fire at an oakland nightclub, then sped away in a car with three suspected accomplices, police said.
